CustomField.description: Relevant for protection and OI recommendations. Used to ensure all third party product literature is saved to the advice folder.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Relevant for protection and OI recommendations. Ensure all third party product literature is saved to the advice folder > "New business - KFDs". A copy should be made and saved to the Portal Documents folder.
CustomField.label: All product brochures saved in G-Drive
